ygData.subject: L Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all! Ok. Lesser Faydark has probably been corrupted on all servers now. Here s my observation on The Rathe: Lots of undead sprite class creatures
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all! Ok. Lesser Faydark has probably been
corrupted on all servers now. Here's my observation on The
Rathe:<br><br> Lots of undead sprite class creatures flying
around. Most are green to me at 26. However, the Undead
Sprite Horrors WILL attack you. They are very
aggressive! They harm touch for 171. They also sometimes proc
rejuvenate during combat. This will fully heal you and
recharge your mana! Quite weird! They also cast clinging
darkness. This makes you move like you are snared and also
drops all speed buffs including wolf form!<br> Of
course, dropping wolf form makes the brownies want to
kill you! Try to keep cancel magic and wolf form
memmed if possible. <br> The U.S. Guards/Guardians drop
twice woven silk, twice woven cloak and power of earth,
all for mage quests. <br> Good exp for a good hunter.
I went from 25 to 26 in about 6 hours. Made about
130pp. This was all solo work. Went in last night for
about 60 min, just under a yellow bubble and 20 pp. Not
fast but fun!<br><br>Timmye Cousteau<br><br>The Wolf
of Karana
